review.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
review.author: Newt Scamander
review.body: This is a great book and I would recommend it to anyone

review.title: Wanderings with Werewolves
review.author: Gilderoy Lockhart
review.body: This book is not for me. I did not like it at all. It was a waste of my time and money!

review.title: A History of Magic
review.author: Bathilda Bagshot
review.body: This book is not for me... I was not impressed with the writing style and the story was not interesting

review.title: Quidditch Through the Ages
review.author: Kennilworthy Whisp
review.body: I love this book. It is the best book I have ever read. The author is a genius!

review.title: A History of Magic
review.author: Bathilda Bagshot
review.body: Rubbish book. I would not recommend it to anyone. I am very disappointed with the author, who is a fraud!

review.title: A History of Magic
review.author: Bathilda Bagshot
review.body: I enjoyed this book. It was a good read. Why is everyone so negative?

review.title: Quidditch Through the Ages
review.author: Kennilworthy Whisp
review.body: I had a blast reading this book. I would recommend it to anyone who is interested in the topic. I wonder if there will be a sequel?

review.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
review.author: J.K. Rowling
